about_the_game:
“Lonely street artist Gene takes the desperate step of joining a crew of fellow graffiti rebels led by the cunning and arrogant young Vanessa. With his help, will the gang be able to shake up the society of their hometown of New Astra, which is suffocating under the cruelty of the authorities and the police?”

VIOLE[n]T RUSH is a short story that will captivate you for a couple of hours with its intricate plot and cyberpunk atmosphere. Learn more about the street art movement of the metropolis of the future, the past of New Astra’s greatest crew – HE11AHOUND – and its legendary founders.

Inside you’ll find:


  • An engaging, fast-paced two-hour story;
  • Stylized, hand-drawn graphics;
  • Colorful characters;
  • Cinematic sound effects, an atmospheric soundtrack, and lifelike visuals.

content_descriptors.notes:
Depending on your choices as the story progresses, you may witness brutality, violence, murder, and mentions of carnal pleasures. 

Regardless of your choices, you will encounter a lot of coarse swearing and foul language as you read the novel.

name: VIOLENT RUSH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64 and higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A near future where inhuman corporations reign supreme. A familiar story, isn’t it? Once again, few have the courage to challenge the authorities. And here are our heroes – desperate young guys. They are armed with spray cans and… the truth.
